capabilities.name: Inspire Direction and Purpose
capabilities.description: The role requires providing high-level leadership and strategic direction, particularly in climate change and strategy.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Essential for engaging with key stakeholders across all levels of government and the community.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Critical for leading consultations and negotiations with various stakeholders to improve sustainability practices and implement net zero strategy measures.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Important for leading the transition to net zero and building resilience to climate change.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Necessary for overseeing high-quality analysis, advice, and ensuring strategic decisions support the Minister effectively.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Essential for strategic policy development and managing cross-sector initiatives.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Key for leading and coordinating inter-agency, inter-government, and cross-sectoral initiatives.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Fundamental for maintaining ethical standards and professionalism in a high-level executive role.

skills.name: Strategic Leadership
skills.description: Leading the direction and strategy for climate change initiatives and energy transition.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Building and managing relationships with government, industry partners, and communities.

skills.name: Policy Development
skills.description: Formulating strategic policies to address climate change and energy transition.

skills.name: Sustainability Practices
skills.description: Implementing and improving sustainability practices within agencies and authorities.

generalRole.title: Executive Director, Climate Change and Strategy
generalRole.description: This role involves leading strategic initiatives and policy development for climate change and energy transition, providing high-level advice, and building key partnerships to drive the sustainable transition to a net zero economy.
